message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS

This paper presents a new algorithm for solving partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs), which is a common problem in artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics (RO). The algorithm uses point-based value iteration, which is a popular technique in machine learning (LG) and control systems (SY). The paper also discusses how the algorithm can be extended to deal with continuous action spaces, which is a topic in data science (DS). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, and cs.DS, in that order.
